  766 |  1            hexa.s    444 | Comment     | 00 |         |    0 | 00/0238               | *     if 0, keep ptrIMAGE
  767 |  1            hexa.s    445 | Comment     | 00 |         |    0 | 00/0238               | *
  768 |  1            hexa.s    446 | Comment     | 00 |         |    0 | 00/0238               | * Exit:
